PayPal.PaymentNotAssociatedOrderGroup: Payment must be associated with an order group.
PayPal.PaymentNotAssociatedOrderForm: Payment must be associated with an order form.
PayPal.PayPalText: The world's most loved way to pay and get paid.
PayPal.PayPalSettingsError: Error in PayPal API settings. Please contact administrator.
PayPal.ProcessPaymentCaptureRequest: The capture request is done, actual capturing must be done on PayPal.
PayPal.ProcessPaymentStatusCompleted: This shopping cart has been paid already on PayPal.
PayPal.ProcessPaymentSetExpressCheckoutError: Error when call SetExpressCheckout to PayPal API.
PayPal.ProcessPaymentTaxValueChangedWarning: The shipping address has been changed that causes tax total changed, please confirm that.
PayPal.NotEnoughStockWarning: Payment completed but not enough stock. Please contact administrators.
PayPal.CartValidationWarning: An error occurred when processing cart.
PayPal.CommitTranErrorCartNull: Cart is null while processing successful transaction redirected back from PayPal
PayPal.CommitTranErrorCartReset: Cart is reset while processing PayPal transaction
PayPal.PaymentCancelMessage: Your payment is declined or cancelled. Please try again or choose another payment method
PayPal.PayPalAPICallError: Unknown error while calling PayPal API.
